Title: Electrophysiology derivatives for BIDS (Brain Imaging Data Structure) -- tools, open platform, and standards
Leaders: BIDS maintainer Christine Rogers at mcgill.ca @christinerogers on both Discord and GitHub
Project Description:
• BIDS derivatives for EEG BEP021 - wrap up, community feedback
  • EEGNet.loris.ca - User feedback on querying interface, data contribution process
  • EEG2BIDS platform-independent tool: user-facing issues and docs

Connect with me to get involved / learn more / access the open resources
Goals for Brainhack Montreal: The form of this project really depends who's at the BrainHack, and available with what skills and interests.
